comments:
I get the following NPE after selecting Debug... or Run... from the drop down 
menu in the task bar. Here's are the events that lead up to the NPE.

1) I had self-hosting Eclipse open
2) I tried to launch again because I forgot the original was open
3) I clicked yes when prompted to clear the workspace (clear was enabled for 
this particular launch configuration).
4) I quit the other eclipse

After these steps I get the NPE below everytime I try to open the Debug... or 
Run... dialogs.
